CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 14, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "Cement "Mixers" - William Penn Hotel was the scene this week of the National Cement Finishers (AFL) convention. Some of the delegates are pictured, left to right: Douglas Turner of Detroit, W.E. Calhoun of Atlanta, Ga., R.L. Deveaux of Detroit, C.V. Turner of Indianapolis, and the Rev. M.W. Irwin of Los Angeles. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of National Cement Finishers (AFL) convention delegates, left to right: Douglas Turner, W.E. Calhoun, R.L. Deveaux, C.V. Turner, and Rev. M.W. Irwin standing in front of brick building with glass block window, another version
